title: How McLaren can win its 10th F1 constructors' title in Singapore
summary: Poised with a commanding points lead in the 2025 constructors' championship, McLaren is on the brink of securing the title at the Singapore Grand Prix

qa_pairs.question: Which team is leading the 2025 F1 constructors' championship?
In which location is McLaren expected to potentially secure its 10th constructors' title?
How many constructors' titles is McLaren aiming to win with their performance in 2025?
